name: tonic
content:
tonic noun
(MEDICINE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a liquid medicine that has the general effect of making you feel better rather than treating a particular health problem that you might have
[ S ] informal something that makes you feel stronger or happier: The magazine is lively and interesting - the pictures alone are a tonic.
